Created attachment 35614
Script Jmeter WebDriverSampler (javascript)

Hello,

I want to take a snapshot when an error occured on previous Test.

I compare the GetLastModifiedTime on log jmeter and the results (JTL file) .

If i have the same time, i take a screenshot to see the error.

On Eclipse Ubuntu , the GetLastModifiedTime is Ok .

On JMeter, the GetLastModifiedTime is the time of the script execution.

I join the script . It's hard to understand where is the problem.

Thanks for ALL

text: I do the script in Java and it's OKAY
